articles.title: Manuel Turizo’s ‘La Bachata’ Returns to No. 1 on Argentina Hot 100
articles.description: Manuel Turizo makes his ascent back to No. 1 with “La Bachata” as the tune logs its 15th week atop the Billboard Argentina Hot 100 chart.
articles.content: Manuel Turizo makes his ascent back to No. 1 with “La Bachata.” The tune logs its 15th week atop the Billboard Argentina Hot 100 chart (dated Dec. 31) and sends Argentinian artist La Mosca Tse-Tse’s “Muchachos, Ahora Nos Volvimos a Ilusionar” below t... [1232 chars]

articles.title: Enzo Fernandez causes fury at Benfica after Chelsea transfer target goes AWOL
articles.description: Enzo Fernandez decided to miss two Benfica training sessions as he returned to Argentina for the New Year and Benfica boss Roger Schmidt was furious with the midfielder
articles.content:

articles.title: Lionel Messi may return to action mid-week with PSG, hopes coach Galtier
articles.description: Lionel Messi took an extended break back home after leading Argentina to World Cup glory in Qatar, scoring twice in a wild final on December 18
articles.content: Paris: Paris Saint-Germain coach Christophe Galtier hopes World Cup winner Lionel Messi is ready to play in a French league game at home to Angers next Wednesday. Messi took an extended break back home after leading Argentina to World Cup glory in Qa... [1122 chars]

articles.title: Enzo Fernandez: Benfica head coach Roger Schmidt says club are being 'disrespected' amid transfer saga
articles.description: Benfica head coach Roger Schmidt did not name any other clubs on Thursday as he spoke about Enzo Fernandezs future; Chelsea are understood to be in ongoing negotiations for the Argentina midfielder over a potential Premier League record transfer
articles.content:
Benfica head coach Roger Schmidt says the Portuguese side are being "disrespected" by another club in pursuit of their midfielder Enzo Fernandez.

articles.title: Enzo Fernandez to Chelsea transfer talks stall but Benoit Badiashile deal finalised amid Mykhaylo Mudryk move
articles.description: Chelsea’s move for Enzo Fernandez has stalled, with Benfica unhappy with their attempts to reduce or spread the cost of a deal to sign the Argentina midfielder.
articles.content:
